begin.description: We have the perfect tool for disseminating your cause. Together with an incredible technology team, we have developed a mobilization platform which is now available for other organizations to promote their causes too.

items.computer: Create pages for your mobilization campaigns

use.title: Use BONDE to cause
use.description: With our technology you can create pressure campaigns, crowdfunding campaigns, raise funds for your organization, create solidarity networks without needing any knowledge of programming.

carousel.amazonia: A bill to make land-grabbing easier was put before the Chamber of Deputies, but thanks to the campaign more than 30,000 people were mobilized and they managed to get the bill thrown out.
carousel.palmas: This was a campaign to enshrine in law an emergency package of measures to improve working conditions for doctors, nurses, intensive care physiotherapists and nursing auxiliaries and assistants working on the frontline against Covid-19.
carousel.agora: All Out held a campaign to pressurize Brazil's Supreme Federal Court into making discrimination against LGBTQ+ people a crime. The mobilization lasted for more than 90 days and the campaign managed to gather more than 700 thousand signatures. The bill was passed!
